properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Once for all Oh sinner recieve it Once for all Oh doubter believe it Cling to the cross The burden will fall Christ hath redeemed us Once for all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Free from the law Oh happy condition Jesus hath bled and there is remission Cursed by the law And bruised by the fall Grace hath redeemed us Once for all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There on the Cross Your burden upbearing Thorns on His brow Your Savior is wearing Never again your sin need appall You have been pardoned Once for all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now are we free There's no condemnation Jesus provides a perfect salvation "Come unto Me" Oh hear His sweet call Come and He saves us Once for all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"Children of God" Oh glorious calling Surely His grace Will keep us from falling Passing from death t To life at His call Blessed salvation Once for all{/lang-eng}
